verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am so happy in Christ today, That I go singing along my way; Yes, I'm so happy to know and say, "Jesus included me, too."

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Jesus included me, Yes, He included me, When the Lord said, "Whosoever," He included me; Jesus included me, Yes, He included me, When the Lord said, "Whoseoever," He included me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Gladly I read, "Whoseoever may Come to the fountain of life today;" But when I read it I always say, "Jesus included me, too."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Ever God's Spirit is saying, "Come!" Hear the Bride saying, "No longer roam;" But I am sure while they're calling home, Jesus included me, too.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "Freely come drink," words the soul to thrill! O with what joy they my heart do fill! For when He said, "Whosoever will," Jesus included me, too. Amen.
